summary: Game of Thrones Post-Finale - Revisiting My Season 8 Predictions
title: Game of Thrones Post-Finale - Revisiting My Season 8 Predictions
body:
Game of Thrones Post-Finale – Revisiting My Season 8 Predictions

On the season as a whole, I really don’t have many words. I didn’t go in with high hopes, but this season was a real disappointment, both thematically and as an adaptation – to say nothing of the gamergate-esque regressive views of women, power, and race that it’s vindicated – in direct opposition to what the source material expressly sets out to subvert and deconstruct. Sigh.

Besides that…

View On WordPress

Introvert/asocial but ask is open.

summary: Things we should have and could have gotten in the final season of game of thrones
body:
Things we should have and could have gotten in the final season of game of thrones

  • WINTERFELL SNOWBALL FIGHT
  • Arya and Daenerys interacting
  • Arya meeting the dragons
  • Daenerys meeting ghost and petting him because he’s a good boy
  • Nymeria swooping in with her pack
  • Arya interacting with Tyrion and Jaime
  • Gendry and Jon
  • Gendry and Davos
  • Gendry properly meeting Sansa and bran
  • Hot pie
  • The hound and Jon
  • More of the hound and gendry
  • The hound and bran (that would have been interesting)
  • The stark siblings actually interacting
  • Aryas face changing ability
  • Nymeria bonding with Gendry
  • Nymeria and ghost reunion
  • Bran getting to be a real person
  • Arya and tormund
  • Tormund and gendry
  • Arya training blindfolded and jon watching proudly
  • A proper discussion about Robb and the other starks that they lost
  • Any weddings
  • Any ships actually living happily
  • A proper feast scene that wasn’t so dramatic
  • Messandi and Daenerys
  • Arya and Varys
  • Sansa and Varys
  • Bran and Varys
  • Daenerys having fun
  • Jon having fun
  • Jon and Arya
  • Domestic moments
  • Theon and Arya
  • Grey worm and Arya
  • Sam and Arya
  • Lyanna and the hound
  • Lyanna and Arya
  • More character interactions in general they built these great characters and they come together and we don’t get to see it

summary:
Gendry: Arya will you Marry me?
Arya: No stupid bullhead, you have to ask my brother first!
Gendry: Ok... Jon will you marry...
body:
Gendry: Arya will you Marry me?

Arya: No stupid bullhead, you have to ask my brother first!

Gendry: Ok… Jon will you marry me?

Jon: OMG Yes! Sorry not sorry Dany

Arya and Daenerys: *facepalm*

summary:
Brienne: So wait, when lemon cakes are involved you can suddenly do math in your head? 
Arya: Hold on, what's 19154 lemon cakes...
body:
Brienne: So wait, when lemon cakes are involved you can suddenly do math in your head?

Arya: Hold on, what’s 19154 lemon cakes divided by 61?

Sansa: 314.

Brienne: And what if they were salads?

Sansa, muttering: Hmmm….carry the four and-

Sansa: Nope.

Sansa: It doesn’t work.

summary: I know Arya is no lady type, but I really want her and Gendry together. He is a Baratheon and she is a Stark, both are warriors...
body: I know Arya is no lady type, but I really want her and Gendry together. He is a Baratheon and she is a Stark, both are warriors and strong in will and I know she has a free spirit but it wouldn’t actually “cancel” their relationship. They could sail together to wherever they want and Gendry could put someone in charge during his time off and they would’ve still be Lady and Lord of Storm’s End. Having responsibilities don’t mean they would have to sit in the councils 24/7 and also Arya could’ve trained new soldiers and lead the armies along side Gendry.

reblog.comment: I know Arya is no lady type, but I really want her and Gendry together. He is a Baratheon and she is a Stark, both are warriors and strong in will and I know she has a free spirit but it wouldn’t actually “cancel” their relationship. They could sail together to wherever they want and Gendry could put someone in charge during his time off and they would’ve still be Lady and Lord of Storm’s End. Having responsibilities don’t mean they would have to sit in the councils 24/7 and also Arya could’ve trained new soldiers and lead the armies along side Gendry.

trail.content_raw: I know Arya is no lady type, but I really want her and Gendry together. He is a Baratheon and she is a Stark, both are warriors and strong in will and I know she has a free spirit but it wouldn’t actually “cancel” their relationship. They could sail together to wherever they want and Gendry could put someone in charge during his time off and they would’ve still be Lady and Lord of Storm’s End. Having responsibilities don’t mean they would have to sit in the councils 24/7 and also Arya could’ve trained new soldiers and lead the armies along side Gendry.
trail.content: I know Arya is no lady type, but I really want her and Gendry together. He is a Baratheon and she is a Stark, both are warriors and strong in will and I know she has a free spirit but it wouldn’t actually “cancel” their relationship. They could sail together to wherever they want and Gendry could put someone in charge during his time off and they would’ve still be Lady and Lord of Storm’s End. Having responsibilities don’t mean they would have to sit in the councils 24/7 and also Arya could’ve trained new soldiers and lead the armies along side Gendry.
